prompt_base: raw photo, 8 year old girl, spiky textured blonde hair, pearl necklace, strapless dress, intelligent gaze
feature_prompt: realistic hair strands, nacre pearl texture, fabric dress texture, detailed skin, soft natural lighting, 8k uhd, sharp focus
negative_prompt: yellow skin, cartoon, anime, drawing, illustration, 3d render, plastic, doll, smooth, deformed, weird hair, lowres
